name: AeroPress
tagline: James Hoffmann's Ultimate AeroPress recipe - the AeroPress recipe everyone has been waiting for!
description: Forget about the AeroPress mysconceptions such as rinsing your paper filter and preheating your AeroPress, and just brew an awesome cup using this recipe. Don't press down to hard, be gentle!

steps.description: Pour in {{ target }}ml, wetting all the grounds
Place the piston piece into the top, about 1cm in, and wait
Holding the brewer and piston, gently swirl, and wait
Press down gently until the brewer is empty
